001package io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.util.table;
002
003import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.table.exceptions.TableException;
004import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.table.model.TableCell;
005import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.selenium.smart.SmartWebElement;
006import java.lang.reflect.Field;
007import java.lang.reflect.ParameterizedType;
008import java.lang.reflect.Type;
009import java.util.Arrays;
010import java.util.Collections;
011import java.util.List;
012
013/**
014 * Utility class for extracting data from UI table row objects using Java reflection.
015 *
016 * <p>Supports operations like retrieving text values and web elements from fields of type {@link TableCell}
017 * or {@code List<TableCell>}. Also includes helpers for checking type compatibility and normalizing string lists.
018 *
019 * @author Cyborg Code Syndicate üíçüë®üíª
020 */
021@SuppressWarnings("java:S3011")
022public final class TableReflectionUtil {
023
024   private TableReflectionUtil() {
025   }
026
027
028   /**
029    * Extracts all textual content from fields of type {@link TableCell} or {@code List<TableCell>} within a
030    * given row object.
031    *
032    * @param row The row object containing {@link TableCell} fields.
033    * @return A list of strings representing the text content of the table cells in the row.
034    */
035   public static List<String> extractTextsFromRow(Object row) {
036      return Arrays.stream(row.getClass().getDeclaredFields())
037            .filter(field -> TableCell.class.isAssignableFrom(field.getType()) || isListOfTableCell(field))
038            .map(field -> {
039               field.setAccessible(true);
040               try {
041                  Object value = field.get(row);
042                  if (value instanceof TableCell cell) {
043                     return Collections.singletonList(cell.getText());
044                  } else if (value instanceof List<?> list) {
045                     return list.stream()
046                           .filter(TableCell.class::isInstance)
047                           .map(TableCell.class::cast)
048                           .map(TableCell::getText)
049                           .toList();
050                  }
051               } catch (IllegalAccessException e) {
052                  throw new TableException("Failed to access field value", e);
053               }
054               return Collections.<String>emptyList();
055            })
056            .flatMap(List::stream)
057            .toList();
058   }
059
060
061   /**
062    * Extracts all {@link SmartWebElement} instances from fields of type {@link TableCell} or {@code List<TableCell>}
063    * within a given row object.
064    *
065    * @param row The row object containing {@link TableCell} fields.
066    * @return A list of {@link SmartWebElement} objects extracted from the row.
067    */
068   public static List<SmartWebElement> extractElementsFromRow(Object row) {
069      return Arrays.stream(row.getClass().getDeclaredFields())
070            .filter(field -> TableCell.class.isAssignableFrom(field.getType()) || isListOfTableCell(field))
071            .map(field -> {
072               field.setAccessible(true);
073               try {
074                  Object value = field.get(row);
075                  if (value instanceof TableCell cell) {
076                     return Collections.singletonList(cell.getElement());
077                  } else if (value instanceof List<?> list) {
078                     return list.stream()
079                           .filter(TableCell.class::isInstance)
080                           .map(TableCell.class::cast)
081                           .map(TableCell::getElement)
082                           .toList();
083                  }
084               } catch (IllegalAccessException e) {
085                  throw new TableException("Failed to access field value", e);
086               }
087               return Collections.<SmartWebElement>emptyList();
088            })
089            .flatMap(List::stream)
090            .toList();
091   }
092
093
094   /**
095    * Checks whether a field is a {@code List<TableCell>} type.
096    *
097    * @param field The field to inspect.
098    * @return {@code true} if the field is a parameterized list of {@link TableCell}; {@code false} otherwise.
099    */
100   public static boolean isListOfTableCell(Field field) {
101      if (!List.class.isAssignableFrom(field.getType())) {
102         return false;
103      }
104      Type genericType = field.getGenericType();
105      if (genericType instanceof ParameterizedType parameterizedType) {
106         Type[] typeArguments = parameterizedType.getActualTypeArguments();
107         return typeArguments.length == 1 && typeArguments[0] == TableCell.class;
108      }
109      return false;
110   }
111
112
113   /**
114    * Converts a list of strings to lowercase and trims whitespace from each element.
115    *
116    * @param list The input list of strings.
117    * @return A new list with trimmed and lowercased strings.
118    */
119   public static List<String> lowerCaseAndTrim(List<String> list) {
120      return list.stream()
121            .map(s -> s.trim().toLowerCase())
122            .toList();
123   }
124
125}
